product_name: Nathan QuickDraw Plus Insulated Handheld Water Bottle
long_description: With a pouch to carry your phone and built-in insulation to keep your drink cold, the Nathan QuickDraw Plus Insulated Handheld water bottle will be your trusty training partner on warm-weather runs. The built-in insulation of the Nathan QuickDraw Plus Insulated Handheld water bottle keeps your drink cold during warm-weather training runs. Low-profile zippered pocket with key clip is sized to hold your phone and a couple other small essentials, such as a gym card and cash. Quickdraw Plus Insulated Handheld includes a 22 fl. oz. insulated Fire and Ice bottle with sport top to keep your fluids cool longer. Hand strap allows air to circulate around hand while offering a secure fit; strap adjusts to fit any hand size. BPA-free bottle is dishwasher safe (top rack).
short_description: With a pouch to carry your phone and built-in insulation to keep your drink cold, the Nathan QuickDraw Plus Insulated Handheld water bottle will be your trusty training partner on warm-weather runs.
